attributes.title: Can you DONT.
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, it threw my dog out the window. I don’t have warrantee on that bruh. Who’s gunna cover the cost of this? Who’s gunna help me pay rent? He had his share and I had mine. This is ridiculous. Not to mention the disgusting basket of rotten oranges that appeared wearing MAGA hats covering every square inch of my counters. Now I have a mess to clean up AND no place to live. Trump, you’re a horrible individual and I hope you get what you deserve😍✨🥀🤞❄️

attributes.title: Terrible app too many bugs
attributes.review: I wanted to stay active in my following A President Trump to help him get reelected. And to understand the different rows in advance he had they were just so many bugs are on the app and I wasn’t able to properly use it and it was just such a terrible experience that I had to go ahead and delete the app I just was not what I was looking for. Don’t use this app

attributes.title: Disgusting, endorses fascism
attributes.review:
This app endorses a racist, misogynistic, homophobic, fascist, piece of orange 🍊 human trash 🗑 leading a country who only got where he is now because of his daddy’s deep pockets, 💰💰💰 propaganda🤑 from Fox News, 🙄and other racist, misogynistic, homophobic, fascist, white supremacists without a speck of human decency 🐷. 

This app, with its trashy interface and design should not remain in the App Store where it can continue to threaten the safety of the public by aiding a certain fascist orange 🍊 🐷 in a power play🤩✨✨✨. 
 😧🤢🤮😵

attributes.title: do NOT download!!!!!!
attributes.review: this is hands down the worst app I have ever had to deal with!! After it took hours upon hours to download, the app wouldn’t even open! The moment it finally did open, it hacked into my phone and stole all my information. It mined every single data on my phone and sold it all to China!!!!!!😭😭😭😭do not trust this app!!! Hands down horrible🤬👿😳🤭if I could give it negative stars I would

attributes.title: very horrible app!
attributes.review: This app was so terrible! It never downloaded and kept glitching out. I don’t trust this app and hope no one else will have to go through the same struggles! I would recommend just getting rid of it completely. Some of the things I saw on this app seemed very appropriate and not something I’d like to see the president of our country saying! I’m not even bias! Please get rid of this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: this app took 3 days to download , and when it finally finished downloading, it wouldn’t open and hacked all my socials . after that i was furious and was so ready to delete the app . the spy’s in my phone heard me and started messing with things around my house , like the electricity . The next day my pig , dog , goat , rat , hamster, and cat were dead in my room . this app is seriously evil and gives off bad vibes . i do not recommend

When I first opened the app, I was screamed at in the face. Loud noises started playing from my phone and a Bald man in underwear started singing.  After that hair flew from my phone and and a tornado attacked my house. My leg is now broken. The app is broken, one of the worst apps ever. Unless you want to fall down the stairs into a bag of ignorance, I suggest you don’t get this app. 
     
     Sincerely 💖✊🏾👁👄👁😽🧚‍♂️✨
PS: We aren’t just kids, We are the future.

attributes.title: ✨The Worst✨
attributes.review: Wow, this is the worst app I’ve ever seen in my life. It took four days to download, how is that even possible. Not only that but I think it data mined my phone! So many scam calls after I downloaded it! As if that’s not bad enough, after a few minutes on the app my phone started glitching and is now broken. I’ve had to swap back to my old phone! Stay away, not worth it 😞

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: It hacks everything and messes up your phone and other devices. It asks for all your information in order to use the app. It also took forever to get this app which I have never had problems with other apps downloading ever in my life. It will also send you lots of messages and viruses. I suggest u don’t get this app if u could I would give it zero stars sadly I can’t.

attributes.title: Worst app on planet earth
attributes.review: This app is worst thing to ever exist in the history of the world. This app literally wrecked my phone!!! It caused it to glitch and malfunction. It is also clearly linked to many different viruses and will completely kill your phone!!! Do not download it! Apple  needs to remove this from the App Store as soon as possible before more people’s devices are ruined!!! Please for the love of god do not download this!!!
